summary: The most valuable asset in the world is Gold with a market value of 10.89T.Apple follows Gold with a market value of 2.22T. In third place is Saudi Aramco, which has a value of 2.07T.Bitcoin ranks 1 in the worlds most valuable assets with a market capitalization of 10.89T. Ethereum, another cryptocurrency on the list, ranks 2 with a market cap of 2.22T.
